column1: Global Health, Social Justice and Public Policy MSc
column3: Faculty of Social Science & Public Policy
column5: Our Global Health, Social Justice and Public Policy course is a unique study pathway that combines anthropology, philosophy, sociology and science technology studies.Covering topics such as inequalities in preventable mortality, disability, climate change, reproductive rights, pandemic preparedness and access to health care across countries, it will help you to develop advanced skills in the critical analysis and possible solutions for global health inequalities.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
